phy.help: LoRa PHY region: EU868, AS923, AU915, CN470, CN779, EU433, IN865, KR920, US915, US915_HYBRID

over-the-air-activation.help: When set to 1 the application uses the Over-the-Air activation procedure, default: true

nb-trials.help: Indicates how many times join can be tried, default: 12

nwkskey.help: AES encryption/decryption cipher network session key

appskey.help: AES encryption/decryption cipher application session key

tx-max-size.help: User application data buffer maximum size, default: 64, MAX: 255

public-network.help: LoRaWAN will connect to a public network or private network, true = public network

duty-cycle-on.help: Enables/disables duty cycling. NOTE: Disable only for testing. Mandatory in many regions.

lbt-on.help: Enables/disables LBT. NOTE: [This feature is not yet integrated].

automatic-uplink-message.help: Stack will automatically send an uplink message when lora server requires immediate response
